amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to reduce funding level in this bill for the Appalachian Regional Commission to FY19 levels.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Appalachian Regional Commission to FY19.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 306 (Roll no. 536).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 306 (Roll no. 536).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
